question: In what type of clinical trial has RT001 been evaluated against Friedreich's ataxia?
ideal_answer: RT001 was evaluatd in a phase I/II double-blind, randomized, comparator-controlled trial in Friedreich's ataxia patients.

snippets.text: Randomized, clinical trial of RT001: Early signals of efficacy in Friedreich's ataxia.
We conducted a phase I/II double-blind, comparator-controlled trial with 2 doses of RT001 in Friedreich's ataxia patients (9 subjects each cohort).

exact_answer: phase I/II double-blind, randomized, comparator-controlled trial
